explains: vi. 下沉；松垂（sag 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: He put the sagging box in the microwave and nuked it.
sentences.cn: 他将那个变得松软的盒子放入微波炉烹饪。

sentences.en: Clearly understanding the capacity of composite slim beam in the sagging moment region is the basis of structural analysis.
sentences.cn: 明确正弯矩区组合扁梁的受力性能是进行结构分析的基础。
